dialogue_turns.speaker: Host
dialogue_turns.text: The Council of Europe is only for European countries, right? But Kazakhstan, which isn't even in Europe, just had a high-level meeting with its Secretary General.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Council of Europe is only for European countries, right? But Kazakhstan, which isn't even in Europe, just had a high-level meeting with its Secretary General.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev met with the Secretary General of the Council of Europe, Alain Berset, according to the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—Alain Berset met with President Tokayev to talk about expanding cooperation. It's a pretty significant step for Kazakhstan-Europe relations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly-Alain Berset met with President Tokayev to talk about expanding cooperation. It's a pretty significant step for Kazakhstan-Europe relations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the meeting, the sides discussed prospects for strengthening comprehensive cooperation between Kazakhstan and the Council of Europe.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And Tokayev reaffirmed Kazakhstan's commitment to that partnership, while also highlighting his domestic reform agenda—the "Just Kazakhstan" program.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Tokayev reaffirmed Kazakhstan's commitment to that partnership, while also highlighting his domestic reform agenda-the Just Kazakhstan program.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev reaffirmed the country's commitment to deepening engagement with the European organization. He also briefed Berset on the implementation of a wide-ranging political reform program aimed at building a Just Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, which seems like a major political modernization effort. And Berse, uh, Berset expressed the Council's readiness to keep working together.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, which seems like a major political modernization effort. And Berse, uh, Berset expressed the Council's readiness to keep working together.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In turn, Alain Berset expressed the Council of Europe's readiness to further develop cooperation with Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: This was all happening on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum, where Tokayev was really busy—he also met with French officials and business leaders from companies like EDF and Sanofi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: This was all happening on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum, where Tokayev was really busy-he also met with French officials and business leaders from companies like E D F and Sanofi.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On May 29, on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum, Tokayev held talks with Laurent Saint-Martin, President of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the French National Assembly, Bruno Fuchs, and executives from EDF, SUEZ, and Sanofi.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And don't forget Suhail Al Mazrouei, the Energy Minister from the UAE. It sounds like the forum was packed with diplomatic activity.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And don't forget Suhail Al Mazrouei, the Energy Minister from the U A E. It sounds like the forum was packed with diplomatic activity.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Tokayev also met with Suhail Al Mazrouei, Minister of Energy and Infrastructure of the United Arab Emirates, on the sidelines of the Astana International Forum (AIF).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Tokayev used the platform to deliver a strong message too—urging the world to "choose progress over war" amid rising global tensions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Tokayev used the platform to deliver a strong message too-urging the world to choose progress over war amid rising global tensions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev on rising global tensions: 'Choose progress over war'

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how Kazakhstan is positioning itself as this bridge between East and West, engaging with both European institutions and Gulf partners.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how Kazakhstan is positioning itself as this bridge between East and West, engaging with both European institutions and Gulf partners.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And doing it all while pushing ahead with internal reforms. You don't often hear about that level of domestic and foreign policy alignment.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And doing it all while pushing ahead with internal reforms. You don't often hear about that level of domestic and foreign policy alignment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder what kind of role Kazakhstan is trying to carve out on the global stage moving forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder what kind of role Kazakhstan is trying to carve out on the global stage moving forward.
